title: The Summit at Lake Union - Your New Home Awaits!
posting_body: Here at The Summit we love pets!
Pet rent is charged per pet.
Come take a look at a new home for you and your fur family!
Our studio, one, and two bedroom homes are designed for a lifestyle of luxury and comfort with the city of Seattle at your fingertips!

Our spacious and custom interiors as well as amazing community amenities offer you an array of options and conveniences such as a washer & dryer in each home, state of the art 24-hour fitness center (complete with sauna), resident lounge and stunning roof top deck!
Our community is situated above beautiful Lake Union which offers you scenic views and nearby parks that you can walk and explore.
The Summit Leasing Team is here to assist you!
The Summit is in close proximity to Downtown Seattle, I-5, Hwy 99, and public transportation for your convenience!
Federal law prohibits housing discrimination on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, familial status, or disability.
* Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.
Professionally Managed by First Pointe Management Group
